==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=さみだれ}}
A compound of prefix {{m|ja|さ|tr=sa}} and ''midare''. The initially /sa/ is a prefix meaning early and is cognate with that found in {{m|ja|五月|tr=satsuki}} and {{m|ja|早乙女|tr=saotome}}. /midare/ is likely {{m|ja|水垂れ|tr=midare||water fall}}. Literally "rain of the fifth month", does not refer to May but to the fifth month in the lunar calendar.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|acc=h|y=i|さみだれ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さみだれ}}

# a heavy rain that occurs around the fifth lunar moon; an early summer rain
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|552}}
#*: '''Samidare'''. サミダレ (五月雨) Goguatno ame. (五月の雨) Nagaxi (ながし)と呼ばれる, [陰暦]五月の雨.
# that which repeats over and over without lasting long

[[Category:ja:Rain|さみだれ]]
